    Class PlayerNameErrorEvent: controller view event when the player choose a name already used by another player

    Class ReconnectionMsgEvent: controller view event when the player reconnects to the game

    Class RollDraftPoolEvent: controller view event when the player roll the draftpool

    Class GrozingPliersRequestEvent: controller view event for Grozing Pliers tool card request
    StartChooseEvent
    Class StartChooseEvent: controller view event to ask to the player what move he wants to do
    StartGameSceneEvent
    Class StartGameSceneEvent: controller view event that warns player that game is started
    StartMoveEvent
    Class StartMoveEvent: controller view event that asks to the player if want to do a move
    StartPatternEvent
    Class StartPatternEvent: controller view event that asks to the player if want to do a move
    StartRoundEvent
    Class StartRoundEvent: controller view event when a new round starts
    StartToolEvent
    Class StartToolEvent: controller view event that asks the player if he wants to use a tool card
    StartTurnEvent
    Class StartTurnEvent: controller view event to start the new turn
    SuccessfulReconnectionEvent
    Class SuccessfulReconnectionEvent: controller view event that notifies that a player reconnected successfully to the game
    TapWheelRequestEvent
    Class TapWheelRequestEvent: controller view event for Tap Wheel tool card request
    TimerEndedEvent
    Class TimeEndedEvent: controller view event to notifies the player that his time to play is ended
    TimerOtherEvent
    Class TimeOtherEvent: controller view event to notifies the other players that the time of the current player is ended
    ToolCardUpdateEvent
    Class ToolCardUpdateEvent: controller view event that update the list of the toolcard in the single player mode
